data.text:
@jammach @YesWombat Followed the test instructions to the letter, for the first one.

Currently awaiting results of the second test, again following struct instrictions.
@jammach @Reilly2Francis @YesWombat Mine was strong +ve yesterday but -ve today. I’m going to do another just for the lolz 🙄 Sat here waiting for a call about anti virals
@jammach @Reilly2Francis The wee swabs booklet says just 2.5 cm into nostril, though?

@Reilly2Francis @YesWombat Don’t eat or drink anything, even water, for 30min before test. 

Gently blow nose to remove any loose phlegm. 

Swab both tonsils at least three times each. 

Place up your nose, past the opening into your sinus cavity, rotate ten times and move gently in and out.
@Reilly2Francis Oh, and we’re meant to hide the QR thing on photos, apparently.
